comment: Alternate definition of the neighbors of a vertex using the edge function instead of the edges themselves (see also ~ nbgrval ). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 25-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Mar-2021.)
